summary: Adds spell tomes to conjure an Ash Spawn War Axe and Ash Spawn Battle Axe, and a way to create a permanent version of each.
descriptionHtml:
---------------------------------------------------[b]Conjure Ash Spawn Weaponry[/b]-------------------------------------



-----------------------------------------------------------[b]Description[/b]-----------------------------------------------------

                                                [i]MINOR SIDE QUEST SPOILERS[/i]

Adds a conjurable ash spawn war axe, a conjurable ash spawn battle axe, and a craftable/temperable version of each.

The tomes can both be purchased from Talvas Fathryon or Neloth in Tel Mithryn (depending on the version you download). The flame enchant on both the conjured war axe and battle axe will be effected by the augmented flames perk. The craftable versions can be crafted at a forge (If you have the Arcane Blacksmith perk) with a heart stone, ONLY after you\'ve learned the spells. The reasoning behind this is the heart stone was able to alter how the ash guardian worked; So why not use one to keep the weapon permanently? The war axe requires one spawn ash to upgrade, while the battle axe requires two.

If you use the \"None\" version you need to add the spell tomes to your inventory by console commands (to find the command for the books type help \"spell tome: ash\").


-----------------------------------------------------------[b] Known Bugs [/b]----------------------------------------------------


I\'ve tested all last night and this morning and i think i got them all. I\'m only one person and i may have missed a few, if you find one please explain it in the comments section.

----------------------------------------------------------[b]Requirements[/b]-----------------------------------------------------

This mod requires the official Dragonborn DLC

-------------------------------------------------------------[b]Conflicts[/b]---------------------------------------------------------

The Neloth Merchant version will conflict with anything that edits his merchant inventory.
The Talvas Merchant version will conflict with anything that edits his merchant inventory.
The Talvas Inventory version will conflict with anything that edits his inventory
The \"None\" version should not conflict with anything, but the tomes can\'t be acquired in game without console commands.
-----------------------------------------------------------[b] Installation[/b]-------------------------------------------------------

Decide which version you want to install. You only need one.

Manual - click download manually, extract the archive and place the esp into your skyrim/data folder.

Mod Manager - click download with mod manager, click install.

----------------------------------------------------------[b]Uninstallation[/b]-----------------------------------------------------

Manual - delete the esp (it will start with \"Ash Spawn Axe\" followed by the version you chose

Mod Manager - click uninstall.
--------------------------------------------------------------[b]Credits[/b]----------------------------------------------------------

Bethesda for Skyrim and Dragonborn

-----------------------------------------------------------[b]Permissions[/b]-------------------------------------------------------

Please do not reupload my file to other sites without my permission.
If you believe the weapons/spells are underpowered/overpowered please give a detailed description of why you think so and what would make them balanced.
author: Justinw42291
